reviews.sentence: NICE STAY. The rooms were very presentable and good to use. Amenities were provided to me to my expectations and in terms of view the room is good as well. The breakfast also tasted really well with quality Overal a great stay in the hotel.

One of the most comfortable stay at Bhubaneshwar. Guys I would like to let you know that Ginger has the best of the accommodation provided across Bhubaneshwar provided you keep an information of the number of rooms Vacant. Throughout the year delegates from tata and subsidiary units Visit Bhubaneshwar periodically so its not always that you get a room I would insist on a pre booking a room in Ginger Bhubaneshwar than going on that day and leaving disheartened. Moving on double rooms are most occupied which has king size bed so again to take the priviledge of those rooms a preboing is mandatory. Those rooms need to be increased in coming number of years for Ginger. Leave aside these points and the rest is bliss on earth. The staff is the most educated batch of living beings across BSR the room and the wifi remains up all time. The bathroom has more than enough space and toiletries and the bath tub is classy. The food across the restaurant is kinda high as compared to restaurant across Bhubaneshwar but again when you are on vacation these tiny little things does nt come into picture. Mutton Meal and chicken meal are always something that people look out for in Khaja Chowk Menu and then you have a CD which gives 24 hours service for all guests who are staying overnight though that service is a service only for the guests who are staying for the night but again no other CD at Bhubaneshwar operates at 2 pm for a meagre cold coffee. All together its one of the most comfortable and cozy place for any stay.
Very Nice. Room and Cleanliness is so nice even too the staffs are very good.

Nice stay. Room was neat and clean including the wash rooms. Breakfast could have been better prepared. Quality if toiletries needs improvement. Good parking space available for all. Decent security available.

The Ginger has a whole new building with new rooms. It was a very clean and the best room service. Checkin was hassle free. The CD they have is 247 open for people staying at the hotel. Everything was perfect.

The Ginger has a whole new building with new rooms. It was a very clean and the best room service. Checkin was hassle free. The CD they have is 247 open for people staying at the hotel. Everything was perfect.

Good ambience and staff. I am amazed with hotel staff and homely environment of hotel. Staff is very polite and good. Rooms give homely feeling rather than a typical hotel room. Peaceful environment to stay in. Food also tastes good.

Excellent service and hospitality Services and attention was excellent particularly fb Mr Abdul Raj Sharma Mr Abhisekh. Definitely will recommend for future programs. Food quality is good. Room ambience cleanliness punctuality of service is satisfactory.

One of my favorites nice room and smart pricing. Room are OK location is super facility are good with pricing and Tariff staff is good but seem to be very slow over all looks for the hotel is decent and all hotels looks the same food is very taste yet the portion are very small.

Nice stay. The ventilation in the washroom is terrible other than that everything is good. The room service is nice and the behaviour of the people there is too good. The hotel welcomes guest with a smile. Enjoyed the stay.

Old and small rooms. I booked the hotel after looking at the photos given in the website. But the reality was that the room was small old and just average. The toilet was also average. I paid 300 Rs for the room for one night including breakfast. I have stayed in other properties of Ginger and they are better maintained. The breakfast was also average. The Location is away from the market and if you want to go out in search of a Restaurant you will have to travel 23 Kms.

Very basic budget hotel. The room feels like a budget hotel and is not very comfortable but clean. The room is only for sleeping. The reception staff lacked basic customer service skills and were chaotic and had to be repeatedly asked for the same thing before they would deliver. Sometimes they just do not pick up the phone at Reception so you have to go down to Reception and ask repeatedly to get them to do the basics. The coffee shop looked dirty and not many customers so the cakes were sitting there for days. They tried to overcharge me an early arrival fee when in fact the rooms were not ready when we arrived and were put in other rooms until our room was ready so check your bill.

Ginger does not seem to be Tata Product. Bed sheets and covers are unclean and reused. I got a readymade Tea which was cold. Night at 440 AM security opened my room fortunately inside latch was in place. On inquiring He told me that He was testing the card. This means any card can open any room. Lift does not work with room card even if hardware in place. Cleaning all over is shabby.

Good Stay. Location is really convenient. Breakfast spread was finebr There was a mess up with allocated room. The one she allotted me was already occupied and I had to disturb the guest to call reception regarding the same. Changed room but didnot give me new key even after asking for it twice. I had to go down myself to get it rectified.

Very close to railway station and airport is only 30 min distance this hotel is on nandankanan road. There are many hotels around this area. Ginger Bhubaneswar is BB kind hotel. It is good for official trip stay as the hotel has only basic amenities. There is no luxury. The service quality and promptness is not great. They charge for dental kit comb. There is tea maker in room. The overall hotel rooms require a facelift. The overall rating is average.

A growing and promising chain disappoints very much. Room service bad not enough room even for 2 people. Booked a better grade room and expected better but not good at all. Also the restaurant offers a very limited choice.

Nice stay. Hotel was good. Few things need to improve. Windows are locked and keys are not provided. I asked for keys but they said they will give it but it never came. Guest should be provided windows keys. Extra chairs as per no of occupants not there. I asked for extra chairs but was not given. Also bucket should be provided by default for a family check in. Overall this is a nice place to stay.

Receptionist behavior is very bad. Went to Bhubaneshwar with my wife for health checkup at care hospital. My wife is a heart patient. So I choose near the hospital hotel and booked a hotel through make my trip but when we arrived at the hotel reception we stay 30 40 min for paperwork. When I asked why delay my work receptionist said server slow internet slow. Thereafter he gave me a digital key and say go to the front building. A security guard comes with us for identifying the room. At first we climbed 1st floor then 2nd floor at that time we ask security where is our room he was saying just near. On that time my wife was serious because she can not climb stairs for a heart patient. Thereafter we come to a receptionist and saying cancel my booking. Then he was saying wait 15 20 minutes another room will be arranging. After 20 25 minutes provided a room. When we refresh at room water not passing the drain. The next day at 120 pm when I unlock my room through the digital key. The digital key not working and was stay there 20 minutes. Thereafter a technician comes to room and unlock through metal Key. On that time my train time very near. My train Nandan Kanan express time 1218 So very quickly we come to Railway Station with paid extra amount. The room television not showing maximum entertainment channels etc.
Asked for non smoking room but the room was smelling. Too much cigarette smoke in the room. Was suffocating.

Poor accommodation facilities. Hey guys this is my second visit to Ginger and the room was as worst as the first visit. I did drop an oral complaint with the manager director of Ginger. His name is Mr Panda and put a helpless face even the second time when I brought his attention to the quality of the room. I asked him for a refund he shrugged off by offering me dinner. I politely denied. Please do pay attention to customer satisfaction when you charge so high prices for limited facilities. Best regards Lokesh Maragani.
